Lyric:
[by:NickyRomero]
[00:06.16]In the dead of the night
[00:07.78]When your body's sleepless
[00:09.74]It's raining feelings now
[00:12.66]Just wanna get it right
[00:14.47]Searching for meaning in this cold angel town
[00:19.72]I'll be the warmth in your empty hotel
[00:22.96]I'll make it right when you're going through hell
[00:26.33]I'll be the call when there's no one to tell
[00:29.62]Make you light up, light up
[00:32.28]
[00:33.01]Oh-oh, oh-oh
[00:36.38]I'mma, I'mma be there
[00:37.98]I'mma, I'mma be there
[00:39.62]Oh-oh, oh-oh
[00:42.94]I'mma, I'mma be there
[00:44.51]I'mma, I'mma be there
[00:46.26]
[00:46.44]When life hits you hard like a train wreck
[00:49.44]Don't you believe it'll break ya?
[00:52.84]Oh-oh, oh-oh
[00:56.08]I'mma, I'mma be there
[00:57.78]I'mma, I'mma be there
[00:59.61]
[01:12.98]If you lose your mind I'll be your anchor
[01:15.88]Holding your body down
[01:19.22]I'll stay a while
[01:20.77]From now until late to kiss in this angel town
[01:25.81]I'll be the soles of your shoes on the ground
[01:29.20]Running with you till you're safe and you're sound
[01:32.42]We'll make it out of this angel town
[01:35.73]Make you light up, light up
[01:38.48]
[01:39.16]Oh-oh, oh-oh
[01:42.47]I'mma, I'mma be there
[01:44.09]I'mma, I'mma be there
[01:45.74]Oh-oh, oh-oh
[01:49.06]I'mma, I'mma be there
[01:50.65]I'mma, I'mma be there
[01:52.09]

[01:55.64]Don't you believe it'll break ya?
